column5: Hello  Its been awhile since I have posted a fishing report,  I have been out many time in the last couple weeks, fishing rivers out east, local and a couple of north of Barrie rivers...  Todays report is a local report of Toronto, we went less than 45 minutes from my door and had this little creek all to ourselves... I personally went 6-7 rainbows with the largest just over 25 inches  Here are some of the pics for the day, all fish were released to fight again and all caught on rainbow roe..  I hope you enjoy          this one is from Monday
Nice Fish Puddle N***, that second pic looks like you are spankin the fish...How did Loody do?
Nice work, nothing like having one of those creeks to yourself while it is producing! R
You got to love having a honey hole close to home all to yourself Great report and pics DMASSE Thanks for sharing Leechman
very nice, this is what i got today, this is my first fish ever on a centerpin.

Hey Mike  Lu didn't do as well as I did,  We only fishing from sunup to about 9:30..   Like I said I went for 6-7 and lu 00.  He has a excuse, his wife is sick and he is stressed out big time..  POP BY anytime for that $$$$$$$$$$  Paul isnt going to give away rods anytime soon,  very misleading but what can I say I get tons of other stuff,  lets get out  Dave
btw, you are the one that hooked my buddy dan up with the roe bags as you were leaving right?
Nice meeting you Dmasse. Thanks for the roe! Only hooked one the entire day. Kinda got fed up retying so many times in the cold with a broken hand. :/

chefboi17  Yep,  I was the one, Congrats Nice fish  did you get it at the pool we met.    The conditions of the water were perfect, too bad it was a chilly day.  We should all get out sometime..  I hope the roe worked  Dave
looks like you had a great morning man, congrats.  Might be heading out toronto way myself in a few minutes for a late afternoon try.

Hey Dave,  Ya I saw Loodi the other day and told me about his wife...that really sucks,..hoopefully she gets better soon.  I am only heading out weekends for the most part, so if you have a satrurday or sunday off, let me know.  Maybe tommorrow....We hit your backyard river today for a couple hours,..and the bite was slow but we managed a couple good sized ones,..will post in a bit.  if you are off work Sunday, let me know.
